alert.note: Alert for Green; Rock (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 26 at 7:31AM CDT until July 26 at 8:15AM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Milwaukee/Sullivan has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Green County in south central Wisconsin... Southwestern Rock County in south central Wisconsin... * Until 815 AM CDT. * At 731 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Monroe, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Janesville, Beloit, Monroe, Brodhead, Orfordville, Footville, Newark, Browntown, Hanover, Afton, Juda, and Avon. People attending Rock County 4-H Fair should seek safe shelter immediately! THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
